name: Invincible Tiger: The Legend of Han Tao
name_original: Invincible Tiger: The Legend of Han Tao
description:
Invincible Tiger: The Legend of Han Tao is an arcade-fighting game developed by Blitz Arcade. It was originally released in 2009. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
Invincible Tiger: The Legend of Han Tao is available on PlayStation 3.
